modName: The Paths of the Dead - LOTR
summary:
RAISE THE ARMY OF THE DEAD TO DEFEND YOU! 

The way through the mountains from LOTR. Adds a new spell \"Raise the king of the dead\", if you can find the spell book. 

The way is shut... It was made by the dead... and the dead keep it... the way is shut...
descriptionHtml:
RAISE THE ARMY OF THE DEAD TO DEFEND YOU! 

The way through the mountains from LOTR. Adds a new spell \"Raise the king of the dead\", if you can find the spell book.

The book is within the body of the ghostly bodies at the very end of the mod, only then can you learn to raise the greatest army!

The way is shut... It was made by the dead... and the dead keep it... the way is shut... 

Take the road up the great mountain to the paths of the dead
Advice:

BRING A BOW!
Also take a torch, or candlelight spell, or magelight spell, you will be venturing into darkness.

Please Endorse
Please add pictures

LINKS TO MY OTHER MODS
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17917 - Farreach
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9079 - LOTR - Mines of Moria
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9758 - LOTR - Mines of Moria v4
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19137 - The Way through the mountains - LOTR
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19220/ - Paths of the dead - LOTR
author: Dwaugh2
